title: Sleeve, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered with satin and couching stitches, French knots on satin ground
description: Deep golden yellow satin with symmetrical design of a phoenix in floral arabesque on either side of large floral rosette. In bright silk satin stitch with details in French knots, outlined in couched gold thread. Cuff band of orange and black ribbed cloth brocaded in paper gold. Lined with salmon pink satin, now faded.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sleeve, 19th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered with satin and couching stitches, French knots on satin ground. 1955-67-3.
